name: NEFilterSettings
desc: The rules and other settings that define the operation of a filter.

items.name: init(rules: [NEFilterRule], defaultAction: NEFilterAction)
items.desc: Creates a new settings instance from an array of rules and a default action.

items.name: class NEFilterRule
items.desc: A rule for filters that combines a rule to match network traffic and an action to take when the rule matches.

items.name: var rules: [NEFilterRule]
items.desc: An ordered list of rules that define the filter’s operation.

items.name: var defaultAction: NEFilterAction
items.desc: The default action to take for flows of network data that don’t match any of the specified rules.
